snippet: The bride works for a bank; the bridegroom is in the restaurant business.
lead_paragraph: Evangeline Joanna Gavrilis and Richard Andrew Pawlowski were married Saturday evening at the Greek Orthodox Holy Trinity Cathedral in New York. The Rev. Demetrios Kehagias, a Greek Orthodox priest, performed the ceremony. The bride, 32, will continue to use her name professionally. She works in New York as a director in the institutional research sales group of Key Bank, a corporate and retail bank in Cleveland. She graduated from Stanford, from which she also received a master's in sociology. She also received a master's of public administration from New York University.
